    • Uses of IShip in model

      Methods in model that return IShip 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      IShip Facade.createShip()
      Returns a new ship with default values.
      IShip IFacade.createShip()
      Create a new ship with a default position, velocity, radius and direction.
      IShip Facade.createShip(double x, double y, double xVelocity, double yVelocity, double radius, double angle)
      Creates a ship using the given properties.
      IShip IFacade.createShip(double x, double y, double xVelocity, double yVelocity, double radius, double angle)
      Create a new non-null ship with the given position, velocity, radius and angle (in radians).
      Methods in model with parameters of type IShip 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      double[] Facade.getCollisionPosition(IShip ship1, IShip ship2)
      Gets the position at which two ships will collide.
      double[] IFacade.getCollisionPosition(IShip ship1, IShip ship2)
      Return the first position where ship1 and ship2 collide, or null if they never collide.
      double Facade.getDirection(IShip ship)
      Gets the ship's direction expressed in radians.
      double IFacade.getDirection(IShip ship)
      Return the direction of ship (in radians).
      double Facade.getDistanceBetween(IShip ship1, IShip ship2)
      Gets the distance between two ships.
      double IFacade.getDistanceBetween(IShip ship1, IShip ship2)
      Return the distance between ship1 and ship2.
      double Facade.getRadius(IShip ship)
      Gets the ship's radius.
      double IFacade.getRadius(IShip ship)
      Return the radius of ship.
      double Facade.getTimeToCollision(IShip ship1, IShip ship2)
      Gets the time to collision between two ships.
      double IFacade.getTimeToCollision(IShip ship1, IShip ship2)
      Return the number of seconds until the first collision between ship1 and ship2, or Double.POSITIVE_INFINITY if they never collide.
      double Facade.getX(IShip ship)
      Gets the x component of the ship's position vector.
      double IFacade.getX(IShip ship)
      Return the x-coordinate of ship.
      double Facade.getXVelocity(IShip ship)
      Gets the x component of the ship's velocity vector.
      double IFacade.getXVelocity(IShip ship)
      Return the velocity of ship along the X-axis.
      double Facade.getY(IShip ship)
      Gets the y component of the ship's position vector.
      double IFacade.getY(IShip ship)
      Return the y-coordinate of ship.
      double Facade.getYVelocity(IShip ship)
      Gets the y component of the ship's velocity vector.
      double IFacade.getYVelocity(IShip ship)
      Return the velocity of ship along the Y-axis.
      void Facade.move(IShip ship, double dt)
      Moves the ship with the current velocity and acceleration for a given time.
      void IFacade.move(IShip ship, double dt)
      Update ship's position, assuming it moves dt seconds at its current velocity.
      boolean Facade.overlap(IShip ship1, IShip ship2)
      Checks if two ships overlap.
      boolean IFacade.overlap(IShip ship1, IShip ship2)
      Check whether ship1 and ship2 overlap.
      void Facade.thrust(IShip ship, double amount)
      Applies thrust in order to accelerate the ship.
      void IFacade.thrust(IShip ship, double amount)
      Update ship's velocity based on its current velocity, its direction and the given amount.
      void Facade.turn(IShip ship, double angle)
      Turns the ship by the given angle.
      void IFacade.turn(IShip ship, double angle)
      Update the direction of ship by adding angle (in radians) to its current direction.
